    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_109807</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109807</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Hydrogen bonds between water molecules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserstoffbindungen zwischen Wassermolekülen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Obligations d'hydrogène entre les molécules 
d'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ligações do hidrogênio entre moléculas de 
água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legami dell'idrogeno fra le molecole di acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεσμοί υδρογόνου μεταξύ των μορίων ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enlaces del hidrógeno entre las moléculas de 
agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is the third of a series of four diagrams showing chemical bonds. In water, hydrogen bonds form between water molecules as a result of dipoles in the water molecules.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dipole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen atom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen bond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen atom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polar molecule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water molecule</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist der Third einer Reihe von vier 
Diagrammen, die chemische Bindungen zeigen. Im Wasser bindet 
Wasserstoff Formular zwischen Wassermolekülen resultierend aus 
Dipolen in den Wassermolekülen ab.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est le tiers d'une série de quatre diagrammes 
montrant les obligations chimiques. Dans l'eau, les 
obligations d'hydrogène forment entre les molécules d'eau en raison
des dipöles dans les molécules d'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é o third de uma série de quatro diagramas
que mostram ligações químicas. Na água, o hidrogênio liga o
formulário entre moléculas de água em conseqüência dos dipoles 
nas moléculas de água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è il terzo di una serie di quattro schemi 
che mostrano i legami chimici. In acqua, l'idrogeno lega la 
forma fra le molecole di acqua come conseguenza dei dipoli nelle 
molecole di acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι το τρίτο μιας σειράς τεσσάρων 
διαγραμμάτων που εμφανίζουν χημικούς δεσμούς. Στο ύδωρ, το 
υδρογόνο συνδέει τη μορφή μεταξύ των μορίων ύδατος ως 
αποτέλεσμα των διπόλων στα μόρια ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es el tercero de una serie de cuatro 
diagramas que muestran vínculos químicos. En agua, el 
hidrógeno pega la forma entre las moléculas de agua como resultado 
de dipolos en las moléculas de agua.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dipol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserstoffatom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserstoffbindung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
